price: until when he reached the far east, he found the sun rising on a people for whom We provided no shelter from it[45].
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَطۡلِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَطۡلُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ لَّمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُم مِّن دُونِهَا سِتۡرٗا
footnotes: [45] They had nothing to shade them from the sun; trees, mountains, or buildings.
